story: Rasha Abo AlSoud shared The Workshops's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Lean Business Planning for Startups
caption: Lean Business Planning for Startups
description:
This 2 day workshop will take you step by step towards understanding the method, mastering its tools and validating your own idea.

It is a practical workshop...get ready for lots of action!

Outline:
- What is Lean Business Method?
- The difference between Lean and Business model
- How can we use both methods for maximum impact.
- How to use lean to startup?
- How to use lean to develop your business?
- How to use The experimenting board?
- Handling results.
- What are the Real tips from the real entrepreneurs.

*Your big idea will be our case study.
*out come of the workshop will be the validation of your idea/ the validation of the make over your mid aged business needs.

Saturday 13th December at 10am-5pm & 
Satutrday 20th December at 10am-3pm 

370 EGP

*You will be receiving illustrative handouts.

Presented to you by Serial Entrepreneur, Mentor, published Writer and Public Speaker: Rasha Abo Elsoud 
Rasha is the founder of an award winning company @[308480929217227:274:The Workshops], founder and CEO of @[235573646601516:274:Maktaby] and founder of @[1488139801446412:274:Women Entrepreneurs of Egypt]. She has trained tens of startups and mentored many more through our her entrepreneurial career. 

Saturday 13th December at 11am-5pm & 
Satutrday 20th December at 11am-3pm 

Fees: Only 370 EGP

*You will be receiving illustrative handouts.

For registration please fill form: http://goo.gl/forms/FYgDRhqFtl

Address: 4 street 155 Maadi 
Mobile: 01004777809
Email: info@theworkshops-eg.com
